item.title: Other Insurance Claim
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="7/12" el_class="claim-info-left" column_effect="bottommove"][heading tag="h2" align="left" text="Auto Insurance Claim"][vc_column_text]Even a minor fender bender can be an emotional experience, but your claims process shouldn't be. Learn more about howpeace insurance is there for you when you need us most. Suspendisse nisl sem, posuere eu pretium in, convallis non eros. Praesent efficitur metus in nibh sollicitudin tempor. Sed sodales sed risus facilisis interdum. Donec hendrerit a ex in viverra.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Praesent sit amet nisl posuere, congue velit ac, scelerisque augue. Nullam ultricies erat neque. Etiam in tortor non libero vehicula tincidunt. Pellentesque sodales velit eget molestie pretium.[/vc_column_text][heading text="Immediately After the Accident:" tag="h2" align="left"][vc_column_text]Accidents can vary in severity. Sometimes it's a pebble that cracks your windshield, sometimes it's a collision. Here are some guidelines on what to do after an accident:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • Remain calm, if another driver is involved don't argue with them
  • Move your vehicle out of harm's way
  • Make sure everyone is ok and call 911 if necessary
  • If someone else is involved, exchange information, including:
  • Name, address and contact information
  • License number
  • insurance information
  • Witness information
[/vc_column_text][heading text="Reporting the Claim" tag="h2" align="left"][vc_column_text]You can report a claim in a number of different ways - online, over the phone, or with your mobile device. But no matter how you report it there will be some information we'll need to know:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • Your information (name, address and which vehicle was involved)
  • If you weren't driving - the name and address of the person who was
  • Make sure everyone is ok and call 911 if necessary
  • If someone else is involved, exchange information, including:
  • A basic description of what happened
  • Severity of the damage
  • Estimated time / location of the incident
  • Information of anyone else involved (other drivers, witnesses, etc) is also helpful.
  • Downloading the Accident Notes Form or the Liberty Mutual Mobile app can help you keep track of all these details.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" column_effect="bottommove" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1"][claim style="style1"][ibb style="style1"]You can Login to track your payment, or call us at

1-800-1CLAIMS

(1-800-123-4567)

[/ibb][ibb title="Track Your Claim" btn="Login to track" style="style1" link="#"]You can report a claim in a number of different ways - online.[/ibb][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit inte lacinia malesuada justo sit amet vestibulum orci tristiquen nunc nonec ultricies enimullam lorem est.

Knowing what to do after a home or personal property loss is key to avoiding further loss and getting your claim handled smoothly. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose.

item.title: Auto Insurance Claim
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="7/12" el_class="claim-info-left" column_effect="bottommove"][heading tag="h2" align="left" text="Auto Insurance Claim"][vc_column_text]Even a minor fender bender can be an emotional experience, but your claims process shouldn't be. Learn more about howpeace insurance is there for you when you need us most. Suspendisse nisl sem, posuere eu pretium in, convallis non eros. Praesent efficitur metus in nibh sollicitudin tempor. Sed sodales sed risus facilisis interdum. Donec hendrerit a ex in viverra.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Praesent sit amet nisl posuere, congue velit ac, scelerisque augue. Nullam ultricies erat neque. Etiam in tortor non libero vehicula tincidunt. Pellentesque sodales velit eget molestie pretium.[/vc_column_text][heading text="Immediately After the Accident:" tag="h2" align="left"][vc_column_text]Accidents can vary in severity. Sometimes it's a pebble that cracks your windshield, sometimes it's a collision. Here are some guidelines on what to do after an accident:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • Remain calm, if another driver is involved don't argue with them
  • Move your vehicle out of harm's way
  • Make sure everyone is ok and call 911 if necessary
  • If someone else is involved, exchange information, including:
  • Name, address and contact information
  • License number
  • insurance information
  • Witness information
[/vc_column_text][heading text="Reporting the Claim" tag="h2" align="left"][vc_column_text]You can report a claim in a number of different ways - online, over the phone, or with your mobile device. But no matter how you report it there will be some information we'll need to know:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • Your information (name, address and which vehicle was involved)
  • If you weren't driving - the name and address of the person who was
  • Make sure everyone is ok and call 911 if necessary
  • If someone else is involved, exchange information, including:
  • A basic description of what happened
  • Severity of the damage
  • Estimated time / location of the incident
  • Information of anyone else involved (other drivers, witnesses, etc) is also helpful.
  • Downloading the Accident Notes Form or the Liberty Mutual Mobile app can help you keep track of all these details.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" column_effect="bottommove" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1"][claim style="style1"][ibb style="style1"]You can Login to track your payment, or call us at

1-800-1CLAIMS

(1-800-123-4567)

[/ibb][ibb title="Track Your Claim" btn="Login to track" style="style1" link="#"]You can report a claim in a number of different ways - online.[/ibb][/vc_column][/vc_row]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Claim Auto Insurance template has help you to describe your content related to your calim feature. Add your Description of claim, Call to action and Track your claim button.
Even a minor fender bender can be an emotional experience, but your claims process shouldn't be. Learn more about howpeace insurance is there for you when you need us most.

item.title: Claim Auto Insurance
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="7/12" el_class="claim-info-left" column_effect="bottommove"][heading tag="h2" align="left" text="Auto Insurance Claim"][vc_column_text]Even a minor fender bender can be an emotional experience, but your claims process shouldn't be. Learn more about howpeace insurance is there for you when you need us most. Suspendisse nisl sem, posuere eu pretium in, convallis non eros. Praesent efficitur metus in nibh sollicitudin tempor. Sed sodales sed risus facilisis interdum. Donec hendrerit a ex in viverra.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Praesent sit amet nisl posuere, congue velit ac, scelerisque augue. Nullam ultricies erat neque. Etiam in tortor non libero vehicula tincidunt. Pellentesque sodales velit eget molestie pretium.[/vc_column_text][heading text="Immediately After the Accident:" tag="h2" align="left"][vc_column_text]Accidents can vary in severity. Sometimes it's a pebble that cracks your windshield, sometimes it's a collision. Here are some guidelines on what to do after an accident:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • Remain calm, if another driver is involved don't argue with them
  • Move your vehicle out of harm's way
  • Make sure everyone is ok and call 911 if necessary
  • If someone else is involved, exchange information, including:
  • Name, address and contact information
  • License number
  • insurance information
  • Witness information
[/vc_column_text][heading text="Reporting the Claim" tag="h2" align="left"][vc_column_text]You can report a claim in a number of different ways - online, over the phone, or with your mobile device. But no matter how you report it there will be some information we'll need to know:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
  • Your information (name, address and which vehicle was involved)
  • If you weren't driving - the name and address of the person who was
  • Make sure everyone is ok and call 911 if necessary
  • If someone else is involved, exchange information, including:
  • A basic description of what happened
  • Severity of the damage
  • Estimated time / location of the incident
  • Information of anyone else involved (other drivers, witnesses, etc) is also helpful.
  • Downloading the Accident Notes Form or the Liberty Mutual Mobile app can help you keep track of all these details.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" column_effect="bottommove" offset="vc_col-lg-offset-1"][iim photo="558" icon="car"][ibb style="style1"]You can Login to track your payment, or call us at

1-800-1CLAIMS

(1-800-123-4567)

[/ibb][ibb title="Track Your Claim" btn="Login to track" style="style1" link="#"]You can report a claim in a number of different ways - online.[/ibb][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: James Deo
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: "I have only good things to say, service was very good and professional. I will refer this service to everyone I know. Keep up the good work. In this economy great and professional service is hard to find."

item.title: Jassica Patricia C.
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: "Fusce imperdiet elementum libero eu volutpat. Mauris ut lectus mauris. Mauris ac quam nec odio etlicitudin ac sit amet lectus. Curabitur ante mi, ornare mollis urna nec finibus porta risdiam justo lacinia. "
